ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_aoe_three: Spells will affect a gargantuan area around a targeted block.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_aoe_two: Spells will affect a huge area around a targeted block.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_accelerate: Immensely increases the speed of projectile spells.
Greatly increases the speed of projectile spells.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_extendtime: Immensely extends the time that spells last.
Greatly extends the time that spells last.
